statements: UPDATE face_recognition_data SET image_url='http://example.com/image1.jpg', image_metadata='{
UPDATE face_recognition_data SET face_vector='{0.1, 0.2, 0.3}', image_url='http://example.com/image2.jpg'
UPDATE face_recognition_data SET image_url = 'example_url_1', image_metadata = '{"name": "John Doe", "age": 30}' WHERE face_id = 1
